summary: Navy frogman, Ted Jackson (Elvis Presley), balances his time between twin careers as a deep sea diver and nightclub singer. During a dive, Ted spots sunken treasure and returns with hope to retrieve it.
cast: Elvis Presley|Dodie Marshall|Pat Priest|Pat Harrington Jr.|Skip Ward|Sandy Kenyon|Frank McHugh|Ed Griffith|Read Morgan|Mickey Elley|Elaine Beckett|Shari Nims|Diki Lerner|Robert Isenberg|Elsa Lanchester|Tom Hatten|James Hibbard|Jonathan Hole
keywords: psychotronic film|treasure|reference to benedict arnold|treasure hunter|sunken treasure
title: Como viene, se va
